text: Pumpkin Run is a tributary to the Monongahela River in southwestern Pennsylvania. The stream rises in northeastern Greene and flows north entering the Monongahela River at Rices Landing, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 31% agricultural, 58% forested and the rest is other uses. The population in the watershed is 931 (2010). ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Monongahela River Category:Rivers of Greene County, Pennsylvania
title: Pumpkin Run (Monongahela River tributary)
